author: michelif
body:
a. Fixed bug in EcalClusterTools 
b. Optimized seeding and gathering threshold for PF cluster producer in EK
c. Added hard et cut in PF supercluster ECAL producer mustache only in endcap
d. Fixing bug in Multi5x5 producer
e. fixing electron mctruth
title: Bug fixes and Optimization of PF cluster producer in shashlik
